name: rexeq
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(w0, w0))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(w0, w0))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c1, w0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Equality theorem for restricted existential quantifier. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-1995.) Remove usage of ~ ax-10 , ~ ax-11 , and ~ ax-12 . (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 30-Apr-2023.)
